snippet.title: Valkyrie 17 / ZX Spectrum Text Adventure
snippet.description:
A play-through of the ZX Spectrum text adventure "Valkyrie 17" following Dorothy Millard's solution.

This adventure came with various supporting documents and "answer phone messages" on the B-Side of the tape that helped set up the adventure and provided additional clues.

The game is running on an "overclocked" emulator to make the graphics draw a little quicker.

Part of the ZX Spectrum Text Adventures playlist: http://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLUbeZeUJd5nwPPLqLjNSc8tCjFssEjXrb&feature=view_all Click the link for more text adventures.
